text: Nods is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comt√© in the Doubs department in east France. It is the seat of the new commune of Les Premiers- Sapins. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Les Premiers- Sapins. == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Nods, Doubs
